column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was shocked at how plain and terrible the pizza was at Lou Malnat's. I have had Chicago style pizza other places before so I was really expecting something amazing at one of the most famous places in Chicago. The cheese was extra rubbery
column3: the only good thing was the bread and the sauce. The line was also out the door expect about a 1 hour wait at a minimum. The prices are however reasonable but the cost of the pizza can't be much. I would say try another "authentic" spot this place does not deliver yelpers.
